summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 AMERICAN IRONHORSE SLAMMER.  WHILE DRIVING 55 MPH, THE CONTACT NOTICED A CRACK IN THE HANDLE BAR.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THEY WOULD BE UNABLE TO REPAIR IT AND ADVISED HIM TO CONTACT THE MANUFACTURER.  THE CONTACT HAS NOT BEEN ABLE TO CONTACT THE MANUFACTURER.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE IS 5,400 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 4,900.

components: STEERING,SUSPENSION,SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: DT:   MOTORCYCLE'S  HANDLE BARS CRACKED TWICE, ALSO,  GAS TANK CRACKED TWICE, THE REAR SUSPENSION BROKE TWICE.  THE LAST TIME THE MOTORCYCLE CAUGHT ON FIRE. THIS HAS HAPPENED WITHOUT WARNING. TAKEN TO DEALER, AND THEY  FIXED IT, BUT IT RECURRED.  MANUFACTURER WILL NOT GIVE CALLER WRITTEN  INFORMATION ON THE PROBLEMS. THEY  WILL NOT RETURN HIS CALLS.  CALLER HAS OWNED TWO OF THESE MOTORCYCLES AND THE PROBLEMS HAVE  HAPPENED TO BOTH OF THEM.  THE FIRST ONE  HAD SO MANY PROBLEMS THAT HE RETURNED IT AN GOT A NEW ONE THAT HAD PROBLEMS OF ITS OWN.  HAD OTHER MINOR PROBLEMS WITH THE MOTORCYCLES.  RECEIVED  RECALL ON BRAKES, AND WAS STILL HAVING TROUBLE. WHEN HE TOOK IT TO THE MANUFACTURER WITH ODOMETER PROBLEMS THEY GAVE HIM A NEW ODOMETER, AND IT STARTED AT 00,  NOT THE MILES HE HAD ON MOTORCYCLE.*AK

CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE IN JANUARY 2004. AS OF TODAY PARTS NEEDED TO REPAIR THE MOTORCYCLE WERE NOT YET AVAILABLE. CONSUMER WAS WAITING  A LONG TIME,  AND  MANUFACTURER STATED THERE WAS NO RECORD OF PARTS BEING ORDERED.  *AK
